channel.title: Posts on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog

item.title: PenTesting PowerShell Remoting
item.description: Background I have been planning to kick off my blog for sometime now and has just not happened, until now. I intend to share my experiences and notes mostly i take while I learn something. My first blog is about an article I wrote for PenTest Magazine for their PowerShell edition, published in January 2016. PowerShell has been around for quite some time now. Taking humble steps, from a downloadable edition of PowerShell v1.
